content:
The Observation reference range codes:

If "applies to" is intended to specify patient populations for which the range is appropriate, it should include several values currently in "type," specifically those under "endocrine."

If "type" is intended to specify the intended use of the range, I'd recommend more clarity on the distinction between treatment & therapeutic/pre, and among normal, recommended, therapeutic & therapeutic/post.
agree as well. The fact that you are the first to raise this shows how little it is being used.
tracker welcome and if you could supply the clarifying text it may be updated sooner rather than later
